org.openmuc.jmbus

Class Bcd

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • org.openmuc.jmbus.Bcd
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bcd
extends java.lang.Number
    This class represents a binary-coded decimal (BCD) number as defined by the M-Bus standard. The class provides methods to convert the BCD to other types such as double, int or String.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Bcd(byte[] bcdBytes)
      Constructs a Bcd from the given bytes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bcd

        public Bcd(byte[] bcdBytes)
        Constructs a Bcd from the given bytes. The constructed Bcd will use the given byte array for internal storage of its value. It is therefore recommended not to change the byte array after construction.
        Parameters:
        bcdBytes - the byte array to be used for construction of the Bcd.
